00007 SceneGraph::SceneGraph(void)
00008 {
00009         name_property_map_ = boost::get(boost::vertex_name, graph_);
00010 }

00016 void SceneGraph::addRootNode( boost::shared_ptr< SceneGraphNode > rootNode )
00017 {
00018         // Therecan only be one root node
00019         vertices_size_type vertices = boost::num_vertices( graph_ );
00020         assert( 0 == vertices && 0 == nodes_.size() );
00021 
00022         vertex_descriptor d = boost::add_vertex(graph_);
00023         rootNode->setId( d );
00024 
00025         // add the node to the property name map
00026         boost::put(name_property_map_, d, rootNode->getName()); 
00027         //name_property_map_[d] = rootNode->getName();
00028 
00029         nodes_.push_back( rootNode );
00030         rootNode->setIsInserted( true );
00031 }
00032 
00033 void  SceneGraph::addNode( boost::shared_ptr< SceneGraphNode > parentNode, 
00034                          boost::shared_ptr< SceneGraphNode > childNode )
00035 {
00036         vertex_descriptor pid = parentNode->getId();
00037 
00038         // The parent should in the graph and the child should not
00039         assert( parentNode->getIsInserted() && !childNode->getIsInserted() );
00040 
00041         vertex_descriptor cid = boost::add_vertex(graph_);
00042         childNode->setId( cid );
00043         
00044         // put the node name in the property map
00045         boost::put(name_property_map_, cid, childNode->getName());
00046         //name_property_map_[cid] = childNode->getName();
00047 
00048         boost::add_edge(pid, cid, graph_);
00049         nodes_.push_back( childNode );
00050         childNode->setIsInserted( true );
00051 }
00052         
00053 
00054 boost::shared_ptr< SceneGraphNode >  SceneGraph::getNode( vertex_descriptor id )
00055 {
00056         return nodes_[id];
00057 }
00058 
00059 std::string SceneGraph::listNodes( void )
00060 {
00061         vertex_iterator begin, end, it;
00062         std::ostringstream os;
00063         tie(begin, end) = vertices( graph_ );
00064         for( it = begin; it != end; it++)
00065         {
00066                 os << *(nodes_[*it]);
00067                 os << "\n";
00068         }
00069         return os.str();
00070 }

00072 const graph_type SceneGraph::getGraph(void)
00073 {
00074         return graph_;
00075 }

00079 std::string SceneGraph::getDotGraph(void)
00080 {
00081         std::ostringstream os;
00082         boost::dynamic_properties dp;
00083         dp.property("id", boost::get(boost::vertex_name, graph_));
00084         boost::write_graphviz(os, graph_, dp, std::string("id"));
00085         return os.str();
00086 }
